item.title: I Spent 30 Days Testing Azure AI in a Regulated Environment. Here's What Actually Works.
item.description: Microsoft says AI will revolutionize Azure operations by 2028. I tested it in October 2025 in a regulated enterprise with PCI/HIPAA requirements. 60-70% is deployable RIGHT NOW. Real ROI: Saved 15 hours/month, found $4,327 in waste, passed compliance audits easier. Here's what works, what's broken, and the 30-day roadmap.

item.title: Six Azure Tags That Make Chargeback and Showback Actually Work
item.description: One tag can’t tell the whole story. Here’s how I built a practical Azure tagging model that connects operations, finance, and security — and finally made chargeback for shared services accurate and defensible.

item.title: Azure Is Your Cell Phone (And Finance Already Understands It)
item.description: Nobody asks for ROI on paying Verizon instead of building cell towers. But Finance wants ROI on Azure vs on-premises servers. The apps are the business. Azure is just the platform that runs them.

item.title: Why Azure Migrate's 'Agentless' Discovery Fails in Enterprise Hybrid Environments
item.description: Microsoft's official migration tool assumes single domains and flat networks. Here's why it's architecturally incompatible with multi-domain hybrid environments.

item.title: If You're Going to Azure, Better Have a Yard Sale and a Roll-Off Ready
item.description: Finance celebrates retiring 100 apps instead of migrating them. Six months later: Why are we still paying for the old data center? Because 'Retire' isn't a decision, it's a $300K decommissioning project nobody budgeted for.

item.title: Finance Accepts Monthly OpEx for Phones. Why Not Cloud?
item.description: Nobody questions paying Verizon instead of building cell towers. Apps on your phone = value. The network = enabler. Finance gets it. So why do they question the same model for Azure?

item.title: Why Your Azure Migration ROI Calculation Is Wrong Before You Start
item.description: Finance compares Azure VM costs to server costs and declares cloud expensive. They're missing the entire point: no VAR meetings, no hardware refresh, provision in minutes instead of months. The value isn't in the spreadsheet.

item.title: If You Can't Code Your Architecture, You're Not an Architect
item.description: Deploy one VM to learn the variables. Deploy three VMs to learn you're wasting time. Code your fourth deployment or admit you're just clicking buttons for a living.

item.title: How I Reverse-Engineered a Power BI Dashboard (PBIX Modernizer Tool)
item.description: Chris Bowman's CCO Dashboard is 200+ pages of Power BI. I needed to understand it to build CCO 2.0. Built a tool that extracts all queries, measures, and relationships in seconds. .pbix files are just ZIP archives.

item.title: Extract KQL Queries from Azure Workbooks (Workbook → App Tool)
item.description: Azure Workbooks hide 110+ items and complex KQL queries in nested JSON. Built a Streamlit tool that extracts everything in seconds. Parsed Billy York's workbook: 41 queries, full structure, exportable. No more clicking through Azure Portal.
